subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych jumped to an early lead on Roger Federer, withstood a rally and held on to win, 7-6 (1), 6-4, 3-6, 6-3.
snippet: Tomas Berdych jumped to an early lead on Roger Federer, withstood a rally and held on to win, 7-6 (1), 6-4, 3-6, 6-3.
